title: Durbin Discusses Landmark Sentencing Reform Legislation (US Senate Committee on Judiciary)
text: ( Source : US Senate Committee on Judiciary ) 10.05.15 [CHICAGO] - U.S. Senator Dick Durbin (D-IL) held a news conference today to discuss a landmark, bipartisan agreement he helped broker in the Senate to overhaul the nation's criminal
